    /* Scrollbars finas */

    /* Inputs */

</style>

                    <div class="p-3 bg-slate-900 rounded border border-slate-700"><p class="text-[10px] text-slate-500">CRECIMIENTO</p><p id="modal-gro" class="text-lg font-bold text-white">-</p></div>

                    <div class="p-3 bg-slate-900 rounded border border-slate-700"><p class="text-[10px] text-slate-500">COSTE FNEE</p><p id="modal-cost" class="text-lg font-bold text-blue-400">-</p></div>

<script>
// --- Configuración Global ---
Chart.defaults.color = '#64748b';
Chart.defaults.borderColor = '#334155';
Chart.defaults.font.family = "'Segoe UI', sans-serif";

// --- Estado de la Aplicación ---
const state = {
    db: [],
    years: [],
    selectedComp: [],
    compMode: 'abs',
    charts: {} // Guardar instancias de gráficas
};

// --- Utilidades ---
const fmt = {
    num: n => new Intl.NumberFormat('es-ES', { maximumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(n),
    eur: n => new Intl.NumberFormat('es-ES', { style: 'currency', currency: 'EUR', maximumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(n)
};

// --- Módulos Lógicos ---
const logic = {
    async init() {
        try {
            const res = await fetch('ventas_boe.csv');
            if(!res.ok) throw new Error("No se encontró el CSV");
            const txt = await res.text();
            this.processCSV(txt);
        } catch(e) { console.error(e); }
    },

    processCSV(txt) {
        const lines = txt.split('\n').map(l => l.trim()).filter(l => l);
        if(lines.length < 2) return;

        // 1. Detectar Años en Cabecera
        const headers = lines[0].split(';');
        const yearMap = [];
        headers.forEach((h, i) => {
            const m = h.match(/20\d{2}/);
            if(m) yearMap.push({ idx: i, year: parseInt(m[0]) });
        });
        state.years = [...new Set(yearMap.map(y => y.year))].sort((a,b)=>a-b);

        // 2. Parsear Filas
        const newDB = [];
        for(let i=1; i<lines.length; i++) {
            const cols = lines[i].split(';');
            if(cols.length < 2) continue;
            
            const cif = cols[0].trim().toUpperCase();
            const name = cols[1].trim();
            const sales = {};
            
            yearMap.forEach(ym => {
                if(cols[ym.idx]) {
                    // Limpieza numérica ES -> JS
                    let v = cols[ym.idx].trim();
                    if(v.includes('.') && v.includes(',')) v = v.replace(/\./g,'').replace(',','.');
                    else if(v.includes(',')) v = v.replace(',','.');
                    sales[ym.year] = parseFloat(v) || 0;
                }
            });
            if(cif && name) newDB.push({ cif, name, sales });
        }
        state.db = newDB;
        
        // Auto-seleccionar Top 2
        const lastY = state.years[state.years.length-1];
        state.selectedComp = [...state.db].sort((a,b) => (b.sales[lastY]||0)-(a.sales[lastY]||0)).slice(0,2).map(c=>c.cif);
        
        ui.updateDashboard();
        ui.renderChips();
        ui.updateCompChart();
    },

    filterTable() {
        const term = document.getElementById('search-input').value.toLowerCase();
        const filtered = state.db.filter(c => c.name.toLowerCase().includes(term) || c.cif.toLowerCase().includes(term));
        ui.renderTable(filtered);
    },

    searchComp() {
        const term = document.getElementById('comp-search').value.toLowerCase();
        const box = document.getElementById('comp-results');
        box.innerHTML = '';
        if(term.length < 2) { box.classList.add('hidden'); return; }
        
        const matches = state.db.filter(c => c.name.toLowerCase().includes(term) && !state.selectedComp.includes(c.cif)).slice(0,10);
        if(matches.length > 0) {
            box.classList.remove('hidden');
            matches.forEach(c => {
                const div = document.createElement('div');
                div.className = 'p-2 hover:bg-slate-700 cursor-pointer border-b border-slate-700 text-slate-300';
                div.innerHTML = `<div class="font-bold text-white">${c.name}</div>`;
                div.onclick = () => {
                    if(state.selectedComp.length >= 5) alert("Máximo 5");
                    else { state.selectedComp.push(c.cif); ui.renderChips(); ui.updateCompChart(); }
                    document.getElementById('comp-search').value = '';
                    box.classList.add('hidden');
                };
                box.appendChild(div);
            });
        }
    },

    setCompMode(m) {
        state.compMode = m;
        const b1 = document.getElementById('btn-mode-abs');
        const b2 = document.getElementById('btn-mode-idx');
        const active = "w-full text-left px-3 py-2 rounded mb-2 text-xs bg-emerald-500/10 text-emerald-400 border border-emerald-500/50";
        const inactive = "w-full text-left px-3 py-2 rounded mb-2 text-xs bg-slate-900 text-slate-400 border border-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-800";
        if(m==='abs') { b1.className=active; b2.className=inactive; }
        else { b1.className=inactive; b2.className=active; }
        ui.updateCompChart();
    }
};

// --- Módulos UI ---
const ui = {
    switchTab(t) {
        ['mercado', 'comparador'].forEach(id => {
            document.getElementById('view-'+id).classList.add('hidden');
            document.getElementById('btn-'+id).className = 'tab-btn tab-inactive';
        });
        document.getElementById('view-'+t).classList.remove('hidden');
        document.getElementById('btn-'+t).className = 'tab-btn tab-active';
        if(t==='comparador') this.updateCompChart();
    },

    updateDashboard() {
        if(state.db.length === 0) return;
        const lastY = state.years[state.years.length-1];
        const prevY = state.years[state.years.length-2];
        
        let total = 0;
        let best = {n:'-', g:-Infinity};
        
        state.db.forEach(c => {
            const v1 = c.sales[lastY]||0, v0 = c.sales[prevY]||0;
            total += v1;
            if((v1-v0) > best.g) best = {n:c.name, g:v1-v0};
        });

        document.getElementById('kpi-count').innerText = state.db.length;
        document.getElementById('kpi-volume').innerHTML = fmt.num(total) + ' <span class="text-sm text-slate-500">GWh</span>';
        document.getElementById('kpi-cost').innerText = fmt.eur(total * 239000).slice(0,-2) + ' M€';
        document.getElementById('kpi-leader').innerText = best.n;
        document.getElementById('rows-count').innerText = state.db.length;

        this.renderTable(state.db);
        this.renderMarketChart(total); // Simplificado por ahora
    },

    renderTable(data) {
        const lastY = state.years[state.years.length-1];
        const prevY = state.years[state.years.length-2];
        const tbody = document.getElementById('table-body');
        tbody.innerHTML = '';
        
        data.sort((a,b)=>(b.sales[lastY]||0)-(a.sales[lastY]||0)).slice(0,100).forEach(c => {
            const v1 = c.sales[lastY]||0, v0 = c.sales[prevY]||0;
            const trend = v0>0 ? ((v1-v0)/v0)*100 : 0;
            const color = trend>=0 ? 'text-emerald-400 bg-emerald-500/10' : 'text-rose-400 bg-rose-500/10';
            
            tbody.innerHTML += `
            <tr class="border-b border-slate-800 transition-colors hover:bg-slate-800">
                <td class="truncate" title="${c.name}">
                    <div class="font-bold text-white truncate w-64">${c.name}</div>
                    <div class="text-[10px] text-slate-500">${c.cif}</div>
                </td>
                <td class="text-right font-mono font-bold text-white">${fmt.num(v1)}</td>
                <td class="text-center"><span class="text-[10px] font-bold px-2 py-1 rounded ${color}">${trend>0?'+':''}${trend.toFixed(1)}%</span></td>
                <td class="text-center">
                    <button onclick="ui.openModal('${c.cif}')" class="text-slate-400 hover:text-blue-400"><i class="fa-solid fa-eye"></i></button>
                </td>
            </tr>`;
        });
    },

    renderMarketChart() {
        const ctx = document.getElementById('chart-market').getContext('2d');
        const totals = state.years.map(y => state.db.reduce((s,c)=>s+(c.sales[y]||0),0));
        
        if(state.charts.market) state.charts.market.destroy();
        state.charts.market = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'bar',
            data: {
                labels: state.years,
                datasets: [{ label:'GWh', data:totals, backgroundColor:'#2dd4bf', borderRadius:4 }]
            },
            options: { 
                responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, 
                plugins:{legend:{display:false}}, 
                scales:{y:{beginAtZero:true, grid:{color:'#1e293b'}}, x:{grid:{display:false}}} 
            }
        });
    },

    renderChips() {
        const div = document.getElementById('comp-chips');
        div.innerHTML = '';
        state.selectedComp.forEach((cif, i) => {
            const c = state.db.find(x=>x.cif===cif);
            const col = ['#3b82f6','#ec4899','#22c55e','#f97316','#8b5cf6'][i%5];
            div.innerHTML += `
            <div class="flex justify-between items-center p-2 bg-slate-950 rounded border border-slate-700 text-xs text-white">
               <div class="flex items-center gap-2 overflow-hidden"><div class="w-2 h-2 rounded-full flex-shrink-0" style="background:${col}"></div><span class="truncate">${c.name}</span></div>
               <button onclick="state.selectedComp=state.selectedComp.filter(x=>x!=='${cif}'); ui.renderChips(); ui.updateCompChart();" class="text-slate-500 hover:text-red-500"><i class="fa-solid fa-times"></i></button>
            </div>`;
        });
    },

    updateCompChart() {
        const ctx = document.getElementById('chart-comp').getContext('2d');
        const colors = ['#3b82f6','#ec4899','#22c55e','#f97316','#8b5cf6'];
        
        const datasets = state.selectedComp.map((cif, i) => {
            const c = state.db.find(x=>x.cif===cif);
            let d = state.years.map(y=>c.sales[y]||0);
            if(state.compMode==='idx') { const b=d[0]||1; d=d.map(v=>(v/b)*100); }
            return { label:c.name, data:d, borderColor:colors[i%5], backgroundColor:colors[i%5], tension:0.3, borderWidth:2 };
        });

        if(state.charts.comp) state.charts.comp.destroy();
        state.charts.comp = new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'line',
            data: { labels: state.years, datasets },
            options: { 
                responsive: true, maintainAspectRatio: false, 
                interaction:{mode:'index', intersect:false},
                scales:{y:{beginAtZero:false, grid:{color:'#1e293b'}}, x:{grid:{display:false}}},
                plugins:{legend:{display:false}}
            }
        });
    },

    openModal(cif) {
        const c = state.db.find(x=>x.cif===cif);
        const yL = state.years[state.years.length-1];
        const yF = state.years[0];
        
        document.getElementById('modal').classList.remove('hidden');
        document.getElementById('modal-cif').innerText = c.cif;
        document.getElementById('modal-name').innerText = c.name;
        document.getElementById('modal-val').innerText = fmt.num(c.sales[yL]);
        
        // Chart Modal
        const ctx = document.getElementById('chart-modal').getContext('2d');
        if(state.charts.modal) state.charts.modal.destroy();
        state.charts.modal = new Chart(ctx, {
            type:'line',
            data: {
                labels: state.years,
                datasets:[{data:state.years.map(y=>c.sales[y]), borderColor:'#2dd4bf', backgroundColor:'rgba(45,212,191,0.1)', fill:true}]
            },
            options: { responsive:true, maintainAspectRatio:false, plugins:{legend:{display:false}}, scales:{y:{grid:{color:'#1e293b'}}} }
        });
    },
    
    closeModal() { document.getElementById('modal').classList.add('hidden'); }
};

// Start
logic.init();
</script>
